content: day 19 / 24 twinkle twinkle little star abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet difficulty slip_stitch - slip_stitch mc - magic_ring time 15 min single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet material jute hook 3 5 mm written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet x5 15 total round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet from previous round half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in each double_crochet from previous round 25 total round 3 slip_stitch in each single_crochet from previous round single_crochet in each half_double_crochet from previous round half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in each double_crochet from previous round slip_stitch to the first stitch of the round or make an invisible join 35 total weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the star congratulations you finished the 19th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 5 to go
